qas.question: What technology has become more widely available and affordable?
What is an example of a personal videoconferencing system tool?
What has made videoconferencing accessible to many?
Videoconferencing freeware is widely available in what programs?
What has become more available as the availability of freeware has decreased?

plausible_answers.text: has made software based videoconferencing accessible to many

qas.question: What has having access to a webcam done for videoconferencing?
What has happened after internet connectivity for technology has improved?
What type of programs is video capture usually a part of?
What has made high speed internet accessible to many?

context: <a0_0><b4_0>High speed Internet connectivity<b4_0/><a0_0/> has become more widely available at a reasonable cost and the cost of video capture and display technology has decreased. Consequently, personal videoconferencing systems based on a <a1_0>webcam<a1_0/>, personal computer system, software compression and broadband Internet connectivity have become affordable to the general public. Also, the hardware used for this technology has continued to improve in quality, and <b6_0>prices have dropped dramatically<b6_0/>. <a2_0><b8_0>The availability of freeware<b8_0/><a2_0/> (often as <b7_0>part of <a3_0>chat programs<b7_0/><a3_0/>) <b5_0>has made software based videoconferencing accessible to many<b5_0/>.
